definition[0]: the support, especially financial support, that is given to an organization or activity by a patron
definition[1]: the support that you give a particular shop, restaurant etc by buying their goods or using their services
definition[2]: a system by which someone in a powerful position gives people help or important jobs in return for their support
definition[3]: the support a customer gives a shop, restaurant etc by spending money there
example[1]: What will prevent the customer from shifting his patronage to someone else?
definition[4]: the support given to an organization, CHARITY etc by a patron, especially financial support
example[2]: We hope that the new law will encourage private patronage of the arts.
definition[5]: a system in which someone in authority helps people get important positions, jobs etc in return for their support
example[3]: The study found that promotions were based on patronage.
